PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI: :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.PREPARE_JOB :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# <> "Standalone" OR "Managed Domain" : PRINT "&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# must be either Standalone or Managed Domain" : EXIT 1 :ENDIF

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_CLI@WINDOWS
! Validates application name, spaces should not be there :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#) :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# = '' : PRINT Application name must not be empty. Aborting ... : EXIT 1 :ENDIF :SET &SPACE_CHECK# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#, ' ') :IF &SPACE_CHECK# > 0 : PRINT Application name must not contain space. Aborting ... : EXIT 1 :ENDIF
!---------------------- Enable application command ---------------------- :SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command=`"deploy --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#'
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Managed Domain" : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS# = "" : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP# --all-server-groups' : ELSE : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP# = "&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP# --server-groups='&UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS#'" : ENDIF :ENDIF
:SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP#`"'
! -------------------------------------- !Escaped jboss-cli.bat $env:NOPAUSE="True"
&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command=`"quit`" | findstr /C:"Failed to connect to the controller" | Out-Null if ( $? -eq 1) { Write-Host "JBoss is not running or cannot connect to JBoss CLI using the given inputs. Aborting ..." exit 1 }
Write-Host "Checking &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# status ..." $output=$(&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command=`"deployment-info --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#`") :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PS_CMD_CUSTOM@WINDOWS
$output | findstr /C:" not found" | Out-Null if ($? -eq 1) { Write-host "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# does not exist. Aborting ..." exit 1 }
! In Standalone mode, application state can be checked here :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Standalone" $output | findstr /R /C:" OK *$" | Out-Null if ($? -eq 1) { Write-Host "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# is currently running. Aborting ..." : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_FAIL_IF_RUNNING# = "YES" exit 1 : ELSE exit 0 : ENDIF }
$output | findstr /R /C:" FAILED *$" | Out-Null if ($? -eq 1) { Write-Host "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# is currently in FAILED status. Aborting ..." exit 1 }
:ELSE
$output | findstr /R /C:" not added *$" | Out-Null if ($? -ne 1) { Write-host "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# is already assigned to all server groups. Aborting ..." : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_FAIL_IF_RUNNING# = "YES" exit 1 : ELSE exit 0 : ENDIF }
: IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS# NE "" : DEFINE &SERVER_GROUPS#,string, 100 : FILL &SERVER_GROUPS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS#,",") : SET &VAR# = 1 : WHILE &SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#] NE "" $output | findstr /R /C:"^&SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#] " | Out-Null if ($? -ne 1) { Write-host "Server group: &SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#] does not exist. Aborting ..." exit 1 }
$output | findstr /R /C:"^&SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#] *not added" | Out-Null if ($? -ne 1) { Write-host "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# is already assigned to server group &SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#]. Aborting ..." : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_FAIL_IF_RUNNING# = "YES" exit 1 : ELSE exit 0 : ENDIF } : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDWHILE : ENDIF
:ENDIF
! ------------------- Enable Application -------------------
Write-Host "Enabling &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# on JBoss EAP 7 (&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE#) ..."
$output = $(&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP#) :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PS_CMD_CUSTOM@WINDOWS
$output | findstr /C:" operation failed " | Out-Null if ("$?" -eq "True") { Write-Host "Failed to start &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# in JBoss (&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE#). Aborting ..." exit 1 }
! --------------------------------------
Write-Host "Enabling process finished. Checking &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# status again ..."
$output = $(&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command=`"deployment-info --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#`") :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PS_CMD_CUSTOM@WINDOWS
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Managed Domain"
: IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS# = "" ! Return error if the application is still enabled or not added in 1 or more server groups $output | findstr /R /C:" not added *$" | Out-Null if ($? -eq 1) { Write-Host "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# is not assigned to all server groups. Aborting ..." exit 1 }
: ELSE : SET &VAR# = 1 : WHILE &SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#] NE "" $output | findstr /R /C:"&SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#] * not added *$" | Out-null if ($? -eq 1) { Write-Host "Failed to assign &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# to server group &SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#]. Aborting ..." exit 1 } : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDWHILE : ENDIF
:ELSE
$output | findstr /R /C:" OK *$" | Out-Null if ($? -ne 1) { Write-Host "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# is not enabled in JBoss Standalone. Aborting ..." exit 1 } :ENDIF
Write-Host "Start Application successfully."
